modName: Massive Cloud Storage Network - Functional Homes Support
summary: Makes Morgaloth's Massive Cloud Storage Network compatible with Functional Homes by moving some of the containers in vanilla homes so they aren't in the same place as things from Functional Homes. Any of the more then 70 containers placed outside player homes are unchanged.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Kn7D6Q2.png[/IMG][/center]
[heading]Required Mods[/heading]
Morgaloth's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54285/?]Massive Cloud Storage Network[/url] Version 2.02+ COMPLETE
Make sure patch loads after Massive Cloud Storage Network.

I'm sorry, but Home Patches are no longer Compatible with anything but MCSN Complete V2.02+

[heading]Description[/heading]
This patch makes my Massive Cloud Storage Network mod compatible with the Functional Homes mod.
This was requested by several people so here it is. It moves some the containers placed in the five Vanilla homes from my mod so they do not occupy the same spaces as objects placed by Functional Homes.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22940/?]Functional Homes[/url] is NOT required by this mod, (not having it won't break anything) but using this patch with Massive Cloud Storage Network without Functional Homes will place containers in funny places.

[heading]Change Log[/heading]
07/12/14 Uploaded Version 2.0, this fixes things that were broken with Main MCSN v2.0

[heading]Other Mods by Me:[/heading]
